src_text: Kabinete etse hloko tswelopele entsweng ka ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Moralo wa Tshebetso ya Eneji, ha ntse amohela hore ho na le ditshitiso tse ntseng di le teng kgahlanong le marangrang naha..
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyinakile inchubekelembili lebekhona ekufezekiseni Lisu Lemsebenti Wetemandla, nome kunjalo iyakubona kucindzeteleka lokukhulu lokutawubakhona kugridi yavelonkhe..

src_text: Ha naha kena nakong ya Mariha, Kabinete amohetse phethelo ya Konteraka bakeng sa di-megawatts tse 400 (MW) tsa bokgoni bo ekeditsweng ka Standard Offer Programme tla ba inthaneteng pele ho mafelo Motsheanong.
tgt_text: Njengaloku kulelive kucala kungena sikhatsi saseBusika, Ikhabhinethi iyakwemukela kuphotfulwa kweSivumelwane sema-megawatts lange-400 (MW) emandla ekusebenta langetiwe ngekusebentisa i-Standard Offer Programme lolutawuba ku-inthanethi ngembikwekuphela kwenyanga yeNkhwekhweti..

Kwengeta kuloko, Litiko Letemphilo likhetse tibhedlela letinge-213 letingeke ticishelwe gezi ngenhloso yekuwonga, bese kuba naletinge-76 tato lesetivele tikhishiwe futsi kusasetjentelwa kutsi kwengetwe letinye letinge-46 tibhedlela ngekuhamba kwesikhatsi..

src_text: Ho feta moo, Lefapha la Bophelo bo botle le kgethile dipetlele tse 213 hore di se angwe ke ho kgaoha ha motlakase, ho tsona tse 76 di se di ntse di qheletswe ka thoko mme lefapha le sebeletsa hore le eketse dipetlele tse ding tse 46 ha boemo bo se bo hatetse pele..
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iphindze futsi yemukela kwetfulwa nje khona madvute kwe-Energy One-Stop Shop mhla tinge-31 Inkhwekhweti 2023 lokwentiwa yi-Invest SA kute kwentiwe ngekushesha tinchubo tetekulawula letitawusita tinkampani letinsha tekuphehla emandla kutsi nato titimbandzakanye.

src_text: Kabinete amohela hape ho thakgolwa ho atametseng ha Energy One-Stop Shop ka la 31 Motsheanong 2023 ke Invest SA ho potlakisa mekgwa ya taolo tla thusa dikhampani tse ntjha tse fehlang matla hore le tsona di nke karolo etse hloko tswelopele entsweng Seteisheneng se Fehlang Matla sa Kusile ho tsosolosa 3 200 MW, yuniting ya 1, 2, 3 le ya 5, ho marangrang naha qetellong ya..
tgt_text: Iyibonile inchubekelembili lekhona eKusile Power Station kute kongeke 3 200 MW, ngekusebentisa emayunithi 1, 2, 3 na-5, kugridi yavelonkhe ekupheleni kwa-..

src_text: Kabinete tshwenyehile ka tswelopele ya phatlalatso ya ditaba tsa bohata, ho pharalla le metjha ya ditaba ya setjhaba bolelang ka katamelo ya ho putlama ha marangrang naha leng se tla baka ho tima ha motlakase ka ho felletseng.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikhatsatekile mayelana nekuchubeka kwekusatjalaliswa kwetindzaba letingasilo liciniso, ngekusebentisa tinkhundla tekuchumana letinetinsolo letitsi khona madvute nje kutawuba nekufadalala kwegridi yavelonkhe lokutawubangela kutsi kube nekungabi khona kwagezi lonkhe lelive.

src_text: Eskom tiiseditse mmuso ka merero keneng tshebetsong bakeng sa ditshireletso tsa tsamaiso ho thibela ho tima ha motlakase ka ho felletseng naheng yohle.
tgt_text: Ba-Eskom bacinisekise hulumende ngekutsi kunemasu lakhona lagadze kuvikela kucisha kwagezi eveni lonkhe.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletsa hape ho batho bohle ba Afrika Borwa hore ba tswele pele ho boloka motlakase.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyaphindza icela bonkhe bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika kutsi bonge gezi.

src_text: Morero ke ho boloka bonyane 1 000 MW ka letsatsi leng se lekanang le ho boloka mohato wa pele wa ho kgaoha ha motlakase letsatsi ka leng.
tgt_text: Injongo kutsi kongiwe lokungenani 1 000 MW onkhe malanga, lokuyintfo lelingana nekonga sigaba sinye sekucisha gezi ngenhloso yekuwonga lela nalelo langa.

src_text: Letona la Motlakase, Ngaka Kgosientsho Ramokgopa tla tsebisa naha ka dintlha tsa moraorao tsa ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Moralo wa Tshebetso ya Eneji ka Labohlano la 26 Motsheanong 2023, puisanong ya boraditaba.
tgt_text: Indvuna Yetegezi, Dkt.

src_text: Bophelo bo Botle.
tgt_text: Kgosientsho Ramokgopa, utakwatisa live ngalokusha lokumayelana nekufezekisa Lisu Lemsebenti Wetemandla ngaLesihlanu, mhla tinge-26 Inkhwekhweti 2023, emhlanganweni latawubamba nebetindzaba.

src_text: Mmuso thehile komiti sebetsang ya setekgeniki etellwang pele ke Lefapha la Naha la Bophelo bo Botle, ho arabela seweng sa kholera Hammanskraal Toropong ya Tshwane seng bolaile batho ba 15 ho tloha ka la 24 Motsheanong..
tgt_text: Temphilo.

src_text: Ho etswa mosebetsi moholo wa ho lekola mehlodi yohle ka bang teng ya tshilafalo bang ke mehlodi ya metsi, ditanka tse tsamaisang metsi, dipompo le Tshebetso ya ho Hlwekisa Metsi Ditshila ya Rooiwal (WWTW).
tgt_text: Hulumende usungule likomidi lemsebenti tsite leliholwa Litiko Lavelonkhe Letemphilo, macondzana nekuphendvula kulokubhedvuka kwesifo semsheko eHammanskraal edolobheni laseTshwane, lesevele sesendlule netimphilo tebantfu laba-15 ngesikhatsi kukhulunywa mhla tinge-24 Inkhwekhweti..

src_text: Ho fihlela jwale, ha ho na bopaki ba ho fumanwa ha baktheria ya kholera mehloding ena leng se re kgodisang hore ho ka etsahala ebe kholera bile ketsahalo ya nako le nngwe feela ya tshilafalo, ka ditshwaetso tsa hajwale tseo ka nna ya ba di bakilwe ke ba tshwaeditsweng mme le bona ba tshwaetsa ba bang.
tgt_text: Kwentiwa umsebenti ngalokubanti kuhlola yonkhe imitfombo lengaba khona yekungcolisa emanti, kungaba yimitfombo yemanti, emaloli emathangi latfutsa emanti, timpompi kanye ne-Rooiwal Wastewater Treatment Works (i-WWTW).

src_text: Ha mesebetsi ena ntse tswela pele, baahi ba Hammanskraal ba kgothaletswa hore ba bedise metsi pompo mme ba tshele letswai le seng le kae pele ba nwa.
tgt_text: Kute kube ngulamuhle, kusete ligciwane lesifo semsheko lelitfolakele kulemitfombolusito, lokuyintfo lenika sibindzi sekutsi kungenteka lokubhedvuka kwalesifo semsheko kubangwe sehlakalo lesenteke nje kanye sendlula, ngaletehlakalo letikhona tingaba kutsi tibangwa kutselelana ngeligciwane kwebantfu.

src_text: Ho phaella moo, mang kapa mang ya nang le letshollo, ho nyekelwa ke pelo kapa matshwao tshebetso ya mala lokela ho potlakela ngakeng kapa tleliniking ya lehae.
tgt_text: Njengaloku tonkhe letingenelelo tivela, bahlali baseHammanskraal bayakhutsatwa kutsi bawabilise emanti laphuma etimpompini futsi bafake kancane sawoti ngembikwekutsi bawanatse.

src_text: Letona la Metsi le Bohlweki, Monghadi Senzo Mchunu tla kopana le Ramotse wa Toropo ya Tshwane, Mokhanselara Cilliers Brink, ka Labohlano la 26 Motsheanong 2023 boitekong ba ho theha moralo kopanetsweng wa ntjhafatso seng siilwe ke nako ya Rooiwal WWTW..
tgt_text: Kwengeta kuloko, nanome ngubani lonetimphawu tekuhanjiswa sisu, kugonyuluka kufanele bavakashele ngekushesha dokotela nome umtfolamphilo wabo wendzawo..

src_text: Bakeng sa dintlha tse ding ka letsetsa mohala wa mahala sebetsang bosiu le motsheare wa Setsi sa Naha sa Mafu Tshwaetsanang (NICD) ho 082 883.
tgt_text: Indvuna Yetemanti Nekuhanjiswa Kwendle, Mnu.

src_text: Tataiso ya phekolo ya Kholera inthaneteng ho www.nicd.ac.za.
tgt_text: Senzo Mchunu, utawubamba umhlangano naSodolobha waseDolobhenikati laseTshwane, Cllr Cilliers Brink, ngaLesihlanu mhla tinge-26 Inkhwekhweti 2023 ngemitamo yekubopha lisu ngekuhlanganyela lekuvusetela kabusha kwe-Rooiwal WWTW losekukudzala kwengcelwa sikhatsi kutsi kwentiwe..

src_text: Patlisiso ya Kotara ya Basebetsi (QLFS).
tgt_text: Kute utfole lwatiso lolwengetiwe ungashaya lucingo kulenombolo lesebenta busuku nemini yeSikhungo Savelonkhe Setetifo Letitsatselanako (i-NICD) ku: 082 883.

src_text: Kabinete tiisitse hore QLFS ya pele ya 2023 bontshitse keketseho ya botshelela ya kotara ka tatellano ho dipalo tsa mesebetsi le khiro ya batho ba dimilione tse.
tgt_text: Tinkhombandlela tekwelashwa kwesifo semsheko tiyatfolakala nge-inthanethi ku: www.nicd.ac.za.

src_text: 2 haufi haholo le ho fihla khiro ha batho ba dimilione tse.

tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyagcugcuteleka nayibona i-QLFS yekota yekucala ya-2023 lekhombisa kwenyuka emahlanhla lasitfupha ngekulandzelana mayelana ngelinani lemisebenti nekucashwa kwetigidzi leti-.

src_text: Sena ke pontsho hlakileng ya hore moruo wa Afrika Borwa ntlafala ka matla ka mora ho angwa ke sewa sena..

src_text: Kotara ya pele ya dipalopalo tsa khiro di bontsha hore ke mesebetsi 209 000 thehilweng tlasa taolo ya mmuso mme 107 000 seng tlasa taolo ya mmuso nakong ya kotara ya pele ya selemo.
tgt_text: 4 tebantfu labacashwe ngembikwetinsuku letendvulela i-COVID-.

src_text: Dikamano tsa Afrika Borwa le United States (US).
tgt_text: Lena yinkhomba lecacile kutsi umnotfo waseNingizimu Afrika uyavuka uyacina ngemva kwemtselela walolo lubhubhane.

src_text: Kabinete tiisitse hore dikamano tse pakeng tsa Afrika Borwa le US ntse le tsa setswalle, tse matla mme di molemo bakeng sa dinaha ka bobedi ho latela seboka se neng se le dipakeng tsa Letona la Dikamano tsa Matjhaba le Tshebedisano, Ngaka Naledi Pandor le Lenqosa la US Afrika Borwa, Monghadi Reuben Brigety, ya boletseng hore Afrika Borwa fana ka dibetsa ho Russia.
tgt_text: Tinombolo tekucashwa tekota yekucala tikhomba kutsi kudalwe imisebenti le-209 000 kumkhakha lohlelekile kanye nemisebenti le-107 000 kumkhakha longakahleleki ngesikhatsi sekota yekucala yemnyaka.

src_text: Kabinete boletse hape hore metjha ya bodiplomate thehilweng fumaneha dinaheng tsohle, ho kenyeletsa US, ho phahamisa ditaba tse ka hlahang taolong ya dikamano tsa dinaha tse pedi.
tgt_text: Budlelwane emkhatsini weNingizimu Afrika neMelika (i-US).

src_text: Kabinete amohela phatlalatso ya Cyril Ramaphosa ya ho thehwa ha patlisiso ikemetseng ho hlahloba diqoso tsa phano ya dibetsa tsa Afrika Borwa ho Russia.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ibucinisekisile budlelwano emkhatsini weNingizimu Afrika neMelika kutsi busasebuhle, busacinile futsi bunenzuzo emva kwemhlangano weNdvuna Yetebudlelwane Bemave Emhlaba Nekubambisana, Dkt.

src_text: Dintlha tsa patlisiso di tla phatlalatswa ka nako loketseng.
tgt_text: Naledi Pandor neLincusa laseNingizimu Afrika eMelika, Mnu.

src_text: Dikamano tsa Afrika Borwa le Singapore.
tgt_text: Reuben Brigety, mayelana nekuphawula lokutsiwa ukwentile watsi live laseNingizimu Afrika litfumelele live laseRashiya tikhali.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa ile amohela Tonakgolo Lee Hsien Loong wa Rephabliki ya Singapore ka Labobedi la 16 Motsheanong..
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iphindze yakusho kutsi kunetindlela tebuncusa letimisiwe kuto tonkhe tive, lokufaka ekhatsi iMelika, tekuvakalisa tingcinamba nativuka elulawulweni kwebudlelwane emkhatsini wemave lamabili.

src_text: Singapore ke motsetedi ya bohlokwa Afrika Borwa, ka letsete la dibilione tse fetang tse hlano tsa diranta ka kakaretso lefapheng le kang la tlhahiso, ditshebeletso tsa ditjhelete le thekiso ya matlo.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi isemukele simemetelo lesentiwe nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa sekusungula luphenyo lolutimele lwekuphenya letinsolo tekuphakela ngetikhali live laseRashiya yiNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Ditumellano tse saennweng dipakeng tsa dinaha tsena tse pedi di reretswe ho matlafatsa kgwebo, letsete, thuto le tshebedisano ya tshireletso..
tgt_text: Imininingwane yaloluphenyo itawumenyetelwa khona madvute nje..

src_text: Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya Mohlala wa Ntlafatso ya Setereke (DDM) sa Kapa Bophirimela.
tgt_text: Budlelwane beNingizimu Afrika neSingapore.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa ile isa DDM ya botshelela ya Imbizo ya Mopresidente Kapa Bophirimela, Masepaleng wa Lehae wa Drakenstein, Seterekeng sa Cape Winelands, ka Labohlano la 19 Motsheanong..
tgt_text: Mengameli Ramaphosa usingatse Ndvunankhulu Lee Hsien Loong waseRiphabhliki yaseSingapore ngaLesibili, mhla ti-16 Inkhwekhweti..

src_text: Mopresidente ile etella pele moifo tswang mafapheng ohle mmuso mararo tlasa sehlooho se reng: “Le se ke la Siya Mang kapa Mang ka Morao”.
tgt_text: Live laseSingapore lingumtjalitimali lomcoka lapha eNingizimu Afrika, litjale timali letingetulu kwetigidzigidzi le-R5 emikhakheni lefananako neyekwakha imphahla, yetetimali neyemhlaba netakhiwo.

src_text: Imbizo ne etelletswe pele ke ketelo ya Mopresidente sebakeng sa Ntlafatso ya Bodulo ba Batho Vlakkeland Catalytic haufi leng ntshetsopele ya matlo setjhaba kgolo ka ho fetisisa ho fihle jwale Masepaleng wa Lehae wa Drakenstein.
tgt_text: Tivumelwane letisayiniwe emkhatsini walamave lamabili kuhloswe ngato kucinisa kuhwebelana, lutjalomali, temfundvo kanye nekubambisana kutekuvikela..

src_text: Ntlafatso tswetseng pele ka 2017 ha feela tla fana ka matlo 2 556 ho batho ba tshwanelehang..
tgt_text: Imbizo yaMengameli eNshonalanga Kapa YeLuhlelo Lwekutfutfukiswa kweTigodzi (i-DDM).

src_text: Kaho ya matlo 942 Karolo ya Pele ntse tswela pele 454 se phethilwe mme 301 ntse hahwa.
tgt_text: Mengameli Ramaphosa utsatse Imbizo yaMengameli i-DDM yesitfupha wayisa eNshonalanga Kapa, kuMasipala Wendzawo waseDrakenstein eSigodzini saseCape Winelands ngaLesihlanu, mhla ti-19 Inkhwekhweti..

src_text: Bohlokwa ba projeke ena ke hore haha mefuta fapaneng ya dikgetho tsa matlo ho tloha ho batho ba fumanang moputso wa R0 ho ya ho R3 500 (tlasa Ho Qetella Motheo Motjha), ho Lenaneo la Ditjhelete le Hokahaneng le Motho ka Mong, bakeng sa batho ba fumanang moputso pakeng tsa R3 501 le R22 000 ka selemo.
tgt_text: Mengameli uhole litsimba lelivela kuyo yonkhe imikhakha lemitsatfu yahulumende ngaphasi kwengcikitsi letsi: “Ungashiyi Namunye Ngemuva”.

src_text: Monyetla wa Bodulo ba Setjhaba hammoho le wa Bahlabani ba Sesole teng projekeng ena.
tgt_text: LeMbizo yendulelwe kuvakashela kwaMengameli e-Vlakkeland Catalytic Human Settlement Development lesedvute, lokuyintfutfuko yetindlu yemmango lenkhulukati kute kube ngulamuhla lekuMasipala weNdzawo waseDrakenstein.

src_text: Ketelo ya Bolebedi ya Mmasepala wa Motsemoholo wa eThekwini le Mmasepala wa Setereke sa uMgungundlovu ka la 18 le la 19 Motsheanong.
tgt_text: Lentfutfuko leyacala ngemnyaka wa-2017 kutawutsi naseyiphotfuliwe inikete tindlu le-2 556 kulabo bazuzi labafanele.

src_text: Motlatsi wa Mopresidente Paul Mashatile ile buisana le batshehetsi ba amehang ho tsa thuto le thupello, temo, kgwebo le diindasteri nakong ya leeto la bookamedi Mmasepaleng wa Motsemoholo wa eThekwini le Mmasepaleng wa Setereke sa uMgungundlovu le karolo ya DDM ya ketelo ya bolebedi.
Diprojeke tse ka sehloohong tse etetsweng ne le tsa sebaka sa Projeke ya Ntshongweni Catalytic, moo Smart City ntse ahwa pakeng tsa Durban le Pietermaritzburg.
tgt_text: Kwakhiwa kwetindlu letinge-942 eSigabeni Sekucala kuyachubeka, kodvwa letinge-454 setiphotfuliwe kwatsi letinge-301 tisakhiwa.

src_text: Projeke ena tla tsosolosa mosebetsi wa moruo sebakeng seo tla ba le tlatsetso ya diranta tse dibilione tse ka bang 15 tsa letsete dilemo tse latelang tse 10 ho isa ho tse.
tgt_text: Lokumcoka ngalomklamo kutsi unakekela tinhlobo letahlukahlukene tebantfu kusukela kulabo labahola R0 kuya ku-R3 500 (ngaphasi kweLuhlelo Lekuhlaliswa Kwebantfu), kusita ngeTetimali Luhlelo Lwelusitomali Loluchumene Nalowo Nalowo, kulabo labahola emkhatsini wa-R3 501 ne-R22 000 ngenyanga.

src_text: Tsamaiso ya Phepelo ya Metsi.
tgt_text: Omabili ematfuba eTindlu Tesibonelelo kanye nematfuba etindlu teTigayigayi Temphi akhona kulomklamo.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa ile etela Morero wa Metsi Dihlaba tsa Lesotho ka Labobedi la 23 Motsheanong 2023 leng moo ileng kenya letsoho moketeng wa ho fetola lekote la Mohato wa 2 wa projeke saennwe dilemong tse mmalwa tse fetileng mme ile wa dieha, mokete ona ke pontsho ya ho potlakisa mohato wa dinaha tsena tse pedi.
tgt_text: Luvakasho lwekuhlola umsebenti wahulumende lwekuya kuMasipala Wasedolobheni laseThekwini nakuMasipala weSigodzi saseMgungundlovu mhla ti-18 nangemhla ti-19 Inkhwekhweti.

src_text: Morero wa Metsi Dihlaba tsa Lesotho bohlokwa bakeng sa ho netefatsa polokeho ya phepelo ya metsi Gauteng, Foreistata, Mpumalanga, Leboya Bophirima le Kapa Bophirima.
tgt_text: Lisekelamengameli Paul Mashatile ucocisane nalabatsintsekako kutemfundvo nekucecesha, kutekulima, kutemabhizinisi nakutetimboni ngesikhatsi saloluvakasho lwekuya kuMasipala waseDolobheni laseThekwini nakuMasipala weSigodzi saseMgungundlovu njengencenye yeluvakasho lwekuhlola umsebenti wahulumende weluhlelo lwe-DDM.

src_text: Letsete tsamaisong ya phepelo ya metsi bakeng sa ho ntlafatsa bophelo ba MaAfrika Borwa le ntse le tswela pele, ka phano ya diranta tse ka hodimo ho dibilione tse 14 ho bomasepala bakeng sa ho shebana le ditsamaiso tsa phepelo ya metsi tse saletseng morao, ka Thuso ya Infrastraktjha Kgolo ya Mabatowa Mangata (RBIG) le Thuso ya Infrastraktjha ya Ditshebeletso tsa Metsi (WSIG).
tgt_text: Yinye yemiklamo lemcoka levakashelwe kube yindzawo yase-Ntshongweni Catalytic Project, lapho kwakhiwa khona Lidolobhakati Lesimanjemanje emkhatsini weDurban nePietermaritzburg.

src_text: RBIG tla sebediswa diprojekeng tse 130 mme WSIG yona abelwe diprojeke tse fetang 400 ho phatlalla le naha.
tgt_text: Lomklamo utawuvusetela imisebenti yetemnotfo kulendzawo ufake ligalelo lelilinganiselwa kutigidzigidzi leti-R15 telutjalomali eminyakeni lelishumi nale-15 letako..

src_text: Kabinete boetse thabisitswe ke hore Lefapha la Metsi le Bohlweki (DWS) le nka mehato ya ho lwantsha bobodu ka ho busetswa ha dimilione tse ka bang R600 ke dikhamphani tse unneng molemo ka ho fumana dithendara tse sa tlwaelehang.
tgt_text: Sakhiwonchanti semanti.

src_text: Kabinete boetse hokometse mehato ya taolo ya thibelo behilweng ke lefapha ho fedisa ditshenyehelo tse sa tlwaelehang, tse se nang ditholwana le tse se nang thuso.
tgt_text: Mengameli Ramaphosa uvakashele i-Lesotho Highlands Water Project ngaLesibili,

src_text: Kgau ya Tshireletso ya Setjhaba.
tgt_text: mhla tinge-23 Inkhwekhweti 2023 kulokuvakasha ubese utimbandzakanya emcimbini wekugala umhlaba lapho kutawucala kwakhiwe khona umklamo weSigaba.

src_text: Afrika Borwa fumane Kgau ya Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba ya Tshireletso ya Setjhaba (ISSA) le Ditlwaelo tse Ntle ya maemo ho Tshireletso ya Setjhaba bakeng sa Afrika 2023 elang hloko letsete la mmuso bophelong ba bana ba rona, haholo ba tswang malapeng futsanehileng le nang le mathata.
tgt_text: Kwasayinwa iminyaka leminyenti leyengca futsi kwahlangabetana nekubambeleleka, ngako-ke lomcimbi ukhombise kuphutfunyiswa kwalomtamo lomcoka emkhatsini waletive letimbili.

src_text: Tokelo ya ho kena ha Afrika Borwa bakeng sa kgau ena ya maemo ne na le sehlooho se reng: “Katoloso ya hanyane ka hanyane ya kakaretso ya tshireletso ho bana ba nang le mathata: Taba ya Krante ya Tlhokomelo ya Ngwana, Afrika Borwa”.
tgt_text: I-Lesotho Highlands Water Project imcoka ekucinisekiseni kutsi kuba nekuphakelwa kwemanti eGauteng, eFreystata, eMpumalanga, eNyakatfo Nshonalanga naseNyakatfo Kapa.

src_text: Kakaretso ya dikenyeletso tse 138 ile ya fumanwa ho tswa ho ditho tse 48 tsa mekgatlo tswang dinaheng tse fetang 30 tse Afrika.
tgt_text: Lutjalomali lolwentiwa kusakhiwonchanti semanti lwekuphakamisa timphilo tebantfu baseNingizimu Afrika luyachubeka nekwabiwa kwetigidzigidzi letingetulu kwe-R14 kubomasipala kute kulungiswe kusilela emuva kwesakhiwonchanti semanti, ngekusebentisa i-Regional Bulk Infrastructure Grant (i-RBIG) kanye ne-Water Services Infrastructure Grant (i-WSIG).

src_text: Thuso ya rona ya setjhaba ke motheo wa mmuso wa leano la ho fedisa tlala mme ka sehlohong bakeng sa ho kgutlisa seriti sa batho ba habo rona.
tgt_text: I-RBIG itawusetjentiselwa kumiklamo le-130 bese kutsi i-WSIG yona yabelwe imiklamo lengetulu kwe-400 eveni lonkhana.

src_text: Tsamaiso ya tshireletso ya Afrika Borwa hara tse kgolo ka ho fetisisa lefatsheng, mme na le baamohedi ba fetang dimilione tse.

Namakwa Special Economic Zone (SEZ).
tgt_text: NgaLesibili, mhla tinge-30 Inkhwekhweti 2023, Indvuna Yetekutfutfukisa Tenhlalakahle, Mk.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaelletse monwana ho qollwa ha Namakwa SEZ Aggeneys, Kapa Leboya.
tgt_text: Lindiwe Zulu, kanye neNdvuna Yetebulungiswa Nekulungiswa Kwesimilo, Mnu Ronald Lamola, batawubamba inkhulumomphikiswano yeMavoti eSabelomali kantsi imininingwane yemhlangano wabo nebetindzaba itawukhishwa khona madvute..

src_text: Tlhahiso ya ho qolla etswa tumellanong le Molao wa Dibaka tse Kgethehileng tsa Moruo wa 2014 (Molao 16 wa 2014) mme SEZ sisintsweng, ke karolo ya Tshebetso ya Matsete ya Mopresidente.
tgt_text: Ivoti yeSabelomali saseHhovisi laMengameli itakwetfulwa ngaLesitsatfu, mhla tinge-31 Inkhwekhweti 2023 kantsi umhlangano nebetindzaba lomayelana neNchubekelembili neTingucuko Temumo neTichamkelo Tekucashwa letichumaniswe ngekusebentisa i-Operation Vulindlela itawubanjwa ngaLesibili, mhla tinge-30 Inkhwekhweti.

src_text: Namakwa SEZ tla ba senotlolo sa melemo ya morafo, tlhahiso ya hydrogen tala, ntlafatso ya infrastraktjha, eneji ka ntjhafatswang le tshebetso ya temo.
tgt_text: Lusuku Lwe-Afrika nemgubho weminyaka lenge-20 yeNchubo Yekubuyeketana Kwabalingani YaseAfrika (i-APRM).

src_text: Mafapha bohlokwa bakeng sa tlhahiso ya mosebetsi le ntlafatso ya moruo wa Kapa Leboya le naha..
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi kanye nabo bonkhe bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika bahlanganyela nelivekati lase-Afrika nemhlaba wonkhe kugubha Lusuku Lwase-Afrika ngaLesine, mhla tinge-25 Inkhwekhweti.

src_text: Matsete fetang diranta tse dibilione tse 29 se ntse behetswe thoko bakeng sa mohato wa pele wa SEZ.
tgt_text: Lomnyaka ubaluleke ngalokukhetsekile ngobe ngumnyaka wemgubho weminyaka lenge-60 wekusayina kwemculu wekusungulwa kweNhlangano Yelubumbano Lwe-Afrika, lihambambili leLubumbano Lwe-Afrika.

src_text: Ona kenyeletsa boitlamo ho tswa ho Vedanta Zinc (Diranta tse dibilione tse 16), Frontier Rare Earth (Diranta tse dibilione tse 13), Hive Energy (Diranta tse dimilione tse 200) le RRS Trade and Investment (Diranta tse dimilione tse 100)..
tgt_text: Ingcikitsi yemigubho ya-2023 – “Kufezekisa Ngekushesha Kwendzawo Yekuhweba Ngekukhululeka kuleLivekati lase-Afrika” – kwatisa tinyatselo lesetihanjiwe ekuchubeleni embili kusebenta kwendzawo yemhlaba lenkhulu yekuhweba ngekukhululeka.

src_text: Kgatiso ya Boraro ya Leano la Mohlodi wa Metsi Setjhaba (NWRS-3).
tgt_text: Kugujwa kweNyanga yase-Afrika lonyaka kwenteka ngesikhatsi sinye nemgubho weminyaka lenge-20 ye-APRM, lokuhloswe ngayo kukhutsata kubusa lokuhle kulelivekati ngekusebentisa kufundza kulamanye emave ngalokuhlelekile nangekutihlola tsine njengesive matfupha

src_text: Kabinete tjhaelletse monwana NWRS-3 ya 2023, bakeng sa phethahatso, mme leano lena ke le tlamang ho bolaodi bohle le mekgatlo ho kenya tshebetsong Molao wa Naha wa Metsi wa 1998 (Molao 36 wa 1998).
tgt_text: Tincumo Tekhabhinethi.

src_text: Leano lena le susumeditswe ke tlhahlobo ya dilemo tse tharo ya NWRS-2 qollotseng dibaka tsa katleho le dibaka tse ntseng di tobana le mathata..
tgt_text: Indzawo Yomnotfo Lokhetsekile (i-SEZ) yaseNamakwa.

src_text: NWRS-3 na le merero meraro ya sehlooho leng ntlafatso ya metsi le bohlweki lokelang ho tshehetswa, ho fediswa ha tlala le ho se lekalekane, tlatsetso moruong le tlhahiso ya mosebetsi, mme metsi lokela ho sireletswa, ho sebediswa, ho ntlafatswa, ho hlokomelwa le ho laolwa ka tsela tsitsitseng le ka ho lekana.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kucokwa kwe-Namakwa SEZ e-Aggeneys eNyakatfo Kapa.

src_text: Leano lena le etsa ditshisinyo tse tshwarehang bakeng sa ho eketsa phepelo ya metsi, ho fokotsa tlhokeho ya metsi, taolo atlehang ya metsi le bohlweki, ho laola lefapha la metsi le bohlweki, ho aba metsi bakeng sa phetoho, ho kgothaletsa tshebedisano ya matjhaba, le ho laola metsi le bohloweki tlasa maemo lehodimo ntseng fetoha..
tgt_text: Lokucokwa kwentiwa ngekulandzela Umtsetfo Wetindzawo Teminotfo Lekhetsekile, wanga-2014 (Umtsetfo Nombolo 16 wanga-2014) kantsi le-SEZ lephakanyisiwe iyincenye yeMkhankhaso WaMengameli Welutjalomali.

src_text: NWRS-3 phatlaladitswe websaeteng ya DWS ho www.dws.gov.za..
tgt_text: Le-Namakwa SEZ itawuvula inzuzo kutemnotfo letawukhicitwa ngulemayini, kukhicitwa kwehayidrojini leluhlata, kutfutfukiswa kwesakhiwonchanti, emandla lavusetelelwako nemikhicito yetekulima lesetjentiwe.

src_text: Tlaleho ya Mehato Kentsweng Tshebetsong ke Lefapha la Tshireletso (DoD) ho Sebetsana le Diketso le Boitshwaro ba Ditho tsa Sesole sa Naha sa Tshireletso sa Afrika Borwa (SANDF) tse Romelwang Mererong ya ho Boloka Kgotso.
tgt_text: Lemikhakha imcoka ekudaleni imisebenti nekutfutfukisa temnotfo eNyakatfo Kapa naseveni lonkhana.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse tlaleho mabapi le kgatelopele eo Afrika Borwa e etsang ho sebetsana le boitshwaro ba ditho tse ding tsa SANDF tse rometsweng bakeng sa ho boloka kgotso ho phatlalla le kontinente.
tgt_text: Lutjalomali lolungetulu kwetigidzigidzi letinge-R29 seluvele lubekelwe eceleni kutsi lusetjentiselwe sigaba sekucala se-SEZ.

src_text: SANDF se hlokometse mohlodi wa boikgantsho ba naha ha ntse kenya letsoho mererong ya ho boloka kgotso kontinenteng, bakeng sa tshireletso tsitsitseng le kgotso dinaheng tsa Afrika tse ruthuthilweng ke ntwa tse tlasa dithuso tsa Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN)..
tgt_text: Loku kufaka ekhatsi iminikelo levela ku-Vedanta Zinc (tigidzigidzi le-R16), kubaka-Frontier Rare Earth (tigidzigidzi le-R13), kubaka-Hive Energy (tigidzi letinge-R200) nakubaka-RRS Trade and Investment (tigidzi leti-R100).

src_text: Ka diqoso tsa ditlolo tsa thobalano tse amang masole bolokang kgotso tse qadileng ho hlahella ka 2015, Sehlopha sa Tshebetso sa Matona se ile sa thehwa ka 2019 bakeng sa ho etsa dipatlisiso ka diqoso tsa tlhekefetso ya peto le tlhekefetso (SEA) ka hare ho DoD..
tgt_text: Lushicilelo Lwesitsatfu lweLisubuciko Lavelonkhe Letemitfombolusito Yemanti (i-NWRS-3) langa-.

src_text: Kabinete kgotsofaditswe ke letoto la mehato kentsweng tshebetsong ya ho sebetsana le diketsahalo tsa SEA mererong ya ho boloka kgotso ya SANDF.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi iyivumile i-NWRS-3 yanga-2023 kutsi ifezekiswe nekutsi lelisubuciko liyababopha bonkhe labasemagunyeni netikhungo letifezekisa Umtsetfo Wavelonkhe Wetemanti, wanga-1998 (Umtsetfo Nombolo 36 wanga-1998).

src_text: UN nka Afrika Borwa na le ditlwaelo tse ntle ka ho fetisisa mme thoholeditse naha ka kgatelopele eo e entseng ya ho hlakola SEA ka hare ho SANDF.
tgt_text: Lelisubuciko lisita lubuyeketo lweminyaka lemitsatfu lwe-NWRS-2, lolukhona kubona tindzawo lapho kube nemphumelelo khona kanye netindzawo letisanetinsayeya.

src_text: Kabinete hatisitse hore ditlwaelo tsa SEA di ke ke tsa dumellwa ho senya tlaleho ntle ya SANDF kontinenteng..
tgt_text: I-NWRS-3 yakhiwa tinjongo tengcikitsi letintsatfu, letitsi emanti nekuhanjiswa kwendle kufanele kutsi kwesekela intfufuko, kucedvwa kwebuphuya nekungalingani, kufaka ligalelo kutemnotfo nekudala imisebenti, futsi emanti kufanele kutsi avikelwe, asetjentiswe, entiwe ncono, alawulwe futsi aphatfwe ngendlela lesimeme nangekulingana.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Batjha ya.

src_text: Motlatsi wa Mopresidente Mashatile tla beha puo Letsatsing la Setjhaba leo selemong sena le tla ketekwa ka matsatsi mabedi ho tloha ka la 16 ho isa ho la 17 Phuptjane 2023, Setsing sa Dipapadi sa Mangaung, Bloemfontein, Foreistata.
tgt_text: Umbiko ngeTinyatselo letifezekiswe Litiko Letekuvikela (i-DoD) kulungisa indlela yekutiphatsa kwemalunga eMbutfo Wavelonkhe waseNingizimu Afrika Wetekuvikela (i-SANDF) latfunyelwe etindzaweni tekugcina kuthula.

src_text: Matsatsing ao mabedi, ho tla ba le monyetla wa hore batjha ba nke karolo puisanong le Matona, Batlatsi ba Matona le baamehi ba bang ho dithupello tse fapafapaneng, menyetla ya kgwebo le ntlafatso fumanehang ka hara mmuso le balekane ba setjhaba..
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi itfole umbiko lomayelana nenchubekelembili iNingizimu Afrika leyentako kulungisa indlela yekutiphatsa kwalamanye emalunga e-SANDF latfunyelwe kugcina kuthula evenikati lonkhana.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Batjha tla thakgolwa ka Labone la 1 Phuptjane ke Letona la Kantoro ya Mopresidente wa Basadi, Batjha le Batho ba Nang le Boqhwala, ke Ngaka Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma le Hector Pieterson Memorial le Musiamong wa Soweto..
tgt_text: I-SANDF beyingumtfombo weligcabho lavelonkhe nayitimbandzakanya kumikhankhaso yekugcina kuthula kulelivekati kute kube nekusimama nekuthula etiveni tase-Afrika letihlaselwe timphi ngaphasi kweligama laMhlabuhlangene (i-UN)..

src_text: Kabinete ipileditse ho baahi hore ba matlafatse boiteko ba ho netefatsa hore batjha ba fumana menyetla tla ba dumella ho ba le seabo moruong.
tgt_text: Njengaloku kwaba netinsolo temacala etemacansi letimbandzakanya bagcini bekuthula betemphi letavumbuka nga-2015, Licembu Letindvuna Lemsebenti lasungulwa nga-2019 kutsi liphenye lamacala ekuchashatwa nekuhlukunyetwa ngekwemacansi (i-SEA) ekhatsi ku-DoD..

src_text: Mmuso, jwaloka mohiri ya itlhommeng pele arabetse tlhokong ya ntlafatso ya bokgoni le khiro ya batjha ka ho dumella ho hirwa ha baithuti ba sa sebetseng hore ba fumane boiphihlelo ho Lenaneo la Boithuti la Tshebeletso ya Mmuso.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi kuyayijabulisa kubona tinyatselo letentiwe tekulungisa tehlakalo te-SEA ku-SANDF yekugcina kuthula.

src_text: Mmuso boetse kentse tshebetsong Letlole la Khiro ya Setjhaba (SEF) mme wa tsosolosa boiteko ba tlhahiso ya mesebetsi ya Tshebeletso ya Naha ya Batjha (NYS) hulelang dikete tsa batjha ho tsa moruo.
tgt_text: Mhlabuhlangene ubona kutsi lolokwentiwa live laseNingizimu Afrika kuyintfo lenhle kakhulu futsi ulidvumisile ngenchubekelembili leseliyentile kususa netimphandle kuchashatwa nekuhlukunyetwa ngekwemacansi (i-SEA) ku-SANDF.

src_text: Kenello ya Mopresidente Khirong ya Batjha se ntse atlehile ho tshehetsa ho fumaneha ha menyetla dimilione tse.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi igcizelele kutsi umkhuba we-SEA ngeke uvunyelwe kutsi ungcolise lirekhodi lelihle le-SANDF kulelivekati.

src_text: Cabinet approved the introduction of the draft National Small Enterprise Amendment Bill to Parliament.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the introduction of the draft National Small Enterprise Amendment Bill to Parliament.

src_text: The draft Bill aims to amend the National Small Enterprise Act (Act 102 of 1996) and provides for the establishment and registration of the Office of Small Enterprise Ombud Service.
tgt_text: The draft Bill aims to amend the National Small Enterprise Act (Act 102 of 1996) and provides for the establishment and registration of the Office of Small Enterprise Ombud Service.

src_text: It broadens fair processes for small enterprises through the Ombud Service, which will be tasked with considering and disposing of complaints by small enterprises.
tgt_text: It broadens fair processes for small enterprises through the Ombud Service, which will be tasked with considering and disposing of complaints by small enterprises.

src_text: Implementation of the amendments will realise greater stability to the sector and advance economic opportunity through the creation of job opportunities by small, medium and micro enterprises.
tgt_text: Implementation of the amendments will realise greater stability to the sector and advance economic opportunity through the creation of job opportunities by small, medium and micro enterprises.

src_text: In addition to the setting up of the Office; the amendments also include the appointment of Ombud and Deputy Ombud; allocation of powers and functions of Ombud; receipt of complaints, prescription, jurisdiction and investigation; determinations by Ombud; staff of office; delegation by Ombud, Deputy Ombud and Director
